org.quartz.jobs.ee.jms
Interface JmsMessageFactory

public interface JmsMessageFactory

The JmsMessageFactory interface allows for the creation of ajavax.jms.Message. This interface is used in constructing a javax.jms.Message that is to be sent upon execution of a JMS enabled job.

Author:
Weston M. Price
See Also:
SendDesitnationMessageJob, SendQueueMessageJob, SendTopicMessageJob

Method Summary
 Message createMessage(JobDataMap jobDataMap, Session session)
          Creates a javax.jms.Message.
